title: Erigon repeatedly crashing when running along prysm
body:
v2022.08.03

I really don't know if it's a random issue, but in one of my runs, starting a docker compose setup which starts erigon and prysm simultaneously led to erigon crashing during startup.

Docker tries to restart the container, but it keeps crashing. Not sure if there is something clear to do here, will keep doing my tests.

Stopping everything and running only erigon standalone out of docker (without prysm) seems to be working (stage 1 was able to complete to near the tip along with the beacon chain in a previous run).


I would recommend running `--download.verify` and if that doesn't work `snapshots index --rebuild`
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
